physical_appearance:This is a photograph representation of a burmese painting. In the photograph
 a demon of the forest is presenting his bow to the Buddha
 who is in a seated position. The Buddha is seated on the right
 with the demon kneeling on the left. Behind the demon
 there is another man looking at the scene. There is a bird perched on a branch on the left of the photograph. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

 J. (John)
 1837-1921 Gautama Buddha Folk tales

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph representation of a burmese painting. In the photograph, a demon of the forest is presenting his bow to the Buddha, who is in a seated position. The Buddha is seated on the right, with the demon kneeling on the left. Behind the demon, there is another man looking at the scene. There is a bird perched on a branch on the left of the photograph. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
